resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: While the high school I have attended does not offer classes in the ever-changing fields of technology, I have found a way to integrate these fields into my study: I am the founding president of my school's VEX Robotics Club and have taken online courses in STEM fields independently. Additionally, I have significant STEM experience outside of my school.

work.title: Mobile Application Developer
work.description: Designing and programming a React Native mobile application for iOS and Android to help those with traumatic brain injuries. This project includes the Agile Development methodology and use of GitHub as a code repository and issue tracker, and Jira for project management.

work.company: East Los Angeles Community Youth Center
work.title: Tech Instructor
work.description: Taught a "How to Build your own Arduino-based Smart Car" class, "Introduction to Drones", and "LEGO Robotics" to underserved elementary- and middle-school students. Our Robotics team won second place in the First Annual Boyle Heights Robotics Competition. Also, developed the curriculum currently in use for the "How to Build your own Arduino-based Smart Car" class.

work.title: Embedded Application Developer
work.description: Designed and programmed Arduino-based props for escape rooms, such as RFID door locks. These props required the Arduino to interface with various hardware, such as RFID tags, electronic locks, and arrays of buttons.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Tutoring middle- and high- school students from Saint Monica Academy in various subjects, including Latin, Math, and Java Programming.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
